content: AG-D SPX Type 27 Ceramic grinding disc Ultimate-performance ceramic grinding disc for fast, rough grinding – recommended for stainless steel (Type 27) ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to maximize productivity – ceramic grain abrasive technology boosts grinding speed, even in the toughest carbon and stainless steel Self-sharpening surface – for extra-long lifetime and much higher material removal rate Virtually contaminant-free – suitable for use on stainless steel and carbon steel ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – complies with the highest safety standards Applications Edge and surface grinding on steel and stainless steel Weld preparation or cleaning Recommended for very fast, rough removal – when rapid progress is more important than surface finish ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Product Class: Ultimate Grain type: Ceramic Technical Data | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Product Class | Ultimate | Grain type | Ceramic | Blade / disc shape | Type 27 | Arbor size | 22.225 mm ### ITEMS- 2235183 - Grinding wheel 4.5 x 1/4 x 7/8 SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2235131 - Grinding wheel 5 x 1/4 x 7/8 SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2235132 - Grinding wheel 6 x 1/4 x 7/8 SPX - Package Size 10 pc - 2235133 - Grinding wheel 7 x 1/4 x 7/8 SPX - Package Size 10 pc
